name: Al Amyloidosis
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of bone marrow cell morphology
orthostatic hypotension due to autonomic dysfunction

name: Hallermann-Streiff Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of the fontanelles or cranial sutures

name: Fanconi Anemia, Complementation Group C
HOP_symptoms: deficient excision of uv-induced pyrimidine dimers in dna
prolonged g2 phase of cell cycle
chromosomal breakage induced by crosslinking agents

name: Mitochondrial Dna Depletion Syndrome 1
HOP_symptoms: hypointensity of cerebral white matter on mri
subsarcolemmal accumulations of abnormally shaped mitochondria

name: Congenital Disorder of Glycosylation, Type Ia
Multiple Sulfatase Deficiency
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of the periventricular white matter

name: Brachydactyly, Type B1
HOP_symptoms: aplasia/hypoplasia of the distal phalanges of the hand
symphalangism affecting the phalanges of the hand
aplasia/hypoplasia of the distal phalanges of the toes

name: Mitochondrial Dna Depletion Syndrome 4a
HOP_symptoms: neuronal loss in central nervous system

name: Arthrogryposis, Distal, Type 1a
HOP_symptoms: ulnar deviation of the hand or of fingers of the hand

name: Acromesomelic Dysplasia, Maroteaux Type
HOP_symptoms: abnormal form of the vertebral bodies
cone-shaped epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand

name: Arthrogryposis, Distal, Type 3
HOP_symptoms: ulnar deviation of the hand or of fingers of the hand

name: Congenital Disorder of Glycosylation, Type Iic
Congenital Disorder of Glycosylation, Type Ii
Myopathy, Tubular Aggregate, 1

increased variability in muscle fiber diameter
weakness of the intrinsic hand muscles

name: Multicentric Carpotarsal Osteolysis Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: ulnar deviation of the hand or of fingers of the hand

name: Galactosialidosis
HOP_symptoms: cherry red spot of the macula

name: Hemarthrosis
sign_or_symptoms: stiffness of joint, not elsewhere classified in icd10cm

name: Aicardi-Goutieres Syndrome 1
HOP_symptoms: morphological abnormality of the pyramidal tract

name: Weill-Marchesani Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: malformation of the heart and great vessels

name: Brachydactyly, Type E1
HOP_symptoms: aplasia/hypoplasia of the distal phalanx of the hallux

name: Rubinstein-Taybi Syndrome 1
HOP_symptoms: abnormal distal phalanx morphology of finger

name: Granulomatous Disease, Chronic, Autosomal Recessive, Cytochrome B-Positive, Type Ii
HOP_symptoms: absence of bactericidal oxidative respiratory burst in phagocytes

name: Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome, Classic Type, 1
HOP_symptoms: premature birth following premature rupture of fetal membranes

name: Classic Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: aplasia/hypoplasia of the abdominal wall musculature

name: Achondrogenesis, Type Ii
HOP_symptoms: malformation of the heart and great vessels
short tubular bones of the hand

name: Congenital Disorder of Glycosylation, Type Iia
HOP_symptoms: abnormal isoelectric focusing of serum transferrin

name: Palindromic Rheumatism
sign_or_symptoms: stiffness of joint, not elsewhere classified in icd10cm

name: Rhizomelic Chondrodysplasia Punctata, Type 1
HOP_symptoms: calcific stippling of infantile cartilaginous skeleton

name: Nemaline Myopathy 2
HOP_symptoms: respiratory insufficiency due to muscle weakness

name: Acrofacial Dysostosis 1, Nager Type
HOP_symptoms: atresia of the external auditory canal
malformation of the heart and great vessels

name: Epiphyseal Dysplasia, Multiple, with Early-Onset Diabetes Mellitus
HOP_symptoms: cone-shaped epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand

name: Seckel Syndrome 1
HOP_symptoms: cone-shaped epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand

name: Arthrogryposis, Distal, Type 2b1

name: Brachydactyly, Type A2

aplasia/hypoplasia of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger

name: Mitochondrial Dna Depletion Syndrome 7

name: Mandibulofacial Dysostosis, Guion-Almeida Type
HOP_symptoms: morphological abnormality of the middle ear

name: Brachydactyly, Type C
HOP_symptoms: cone-shaped epiphyses of the middle phalanges of the hand
complete duplication of distal phalanx of the thumb
stippling of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb
triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 2nd finger
enlarged epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
triangular epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
enlarged epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 3rd finger
triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 3rd finger
triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 3rd finger
enlarged epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger
triangular epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger
enlarged epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger
triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger
triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger
symphalangism affecting the phalanges of the hand
hypersegmentation of proximal phalanx of second finger
hypersegmentation of proximal phalanx of third finger

name: Multiple Synostoses Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: symphalangism affecting the phalanges of the hand

HOP_symptoms: chromosomal breakage induced by crosslinking agents
